CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Welcome_Call_Complete_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Welcome_Call_Complete_Date__c- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Initial_Client_Contact_Date__c- DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Initial_Client_Contact_Date__c- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Days Between Initial Contact and Welcome
